Articles.Content: So I\'m fairly new to KSP and today I attempted to land on the mun. Everything went perfectly fine until I realized I don\'t know how to deploy the landing struts. I checked the wiki and the forum and couldn\'t find anything. So if you would please reply it would be much appreciated. I have a mun landing to get back to.

Press G.

Also, please search at least *once* before asking a question. This has been asked at least 50 times.
Thank you so much!! BTW, if you read my post I did check for like half and hour until I finally decided to post it, but thanks so much!

I\'m new here as well and almost asked this question today! ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)

I know you got your answer already, but on the first page of the wiki there is a keyboard control map. It\'s visible there. Also, if you go to reconfigure the controls in the game itself, you can view all the mappings.
Sadly, the keyboard control listing on the on-site wiki is incomplete. Until it gets reopened, [this one](http://kspwiki.nexisonline.net/wiki/Key_Bindings) is up to date.
